chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: &PRODUCT; is a merge of two mature projects; JBoss Portal and eXo Portal. It takes the best of both offerings and incorporates them into a single new project. The aim is to provide an intuitive portal for as-is use and a framework to build upon depending on your needs.
This book explains various apsects of &PRODUCT;, such as managing users and access permissions, using portlets and changing simple interface features such as skins, langauage and page orientation.
Refer to the &PRODUCT; Installation Guide for information on downloading and installing the product or the &PRODUCT; Reference Guide for information on more advanced topics.
